TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Be upgraded automatically depending on the amount of Empire Treasury per City.[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]000-049 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_UNHAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]050-099 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +1 [ICON_UNHAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]100-199 [ICON_GOLD] per City: None[NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]200-499 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +1 [ICON_HAPPY][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]500-749 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_HAPPY], +10% [ICON_PRODUCTION][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]750-999 [ICON_GOLD] per City: +2 [ICON_HAPPY], +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION][NEWLINE][SPACE][SPACE][ICON_BULLET]1000over [ICON_GOLD] per City: +3 [ICON_HAPPY], +25% [ICON_PRODUCTION], +25% [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]
